TopicTitle: [Breaking Ground] No documentation on Action Group Sets. How do they work??

Articles.Content: How does one switch between action group sets? How, exactly, does one use axis groups when key bindings are the same as other methods of movement? Can anyone actually spell this out? It's been over a week with this new expansion, and there exist no online tutorials or explanations as to how this works
It tells you about them in the KSPedia

In the SPH/VAB, enable action group sets in the action groups UI. You can set for each group whether it overrides the default action group and/or the default controls.

To switch between them in flight, use the button in the cluster at top right.
